mapper.select: SELECT * FROM options ORDER BY created_at desc
SELECT o.id as option_items_id ,o.options_id ,o.name as option_items_name ,o.price ,o.seq FROM option_items o WHERE o.options_id = #{optionId}

SELECT o.ID, o.NAME, o.STOCK_CHECK, o.STOCK, o.ESSENTIAL, o.SELECT_MIN, o.SELECT_MAX, oi.ID AS option_items_id, oi.NAME AS option_items_name, oi.PRICE, oi.SEQ AS option_items_seq FROM PRODUCTS p LEFT JOIN OPTIONS o ON p.OPTIONS_ID = o.ID LEFT JOIN OPTION_ITEMS oi ON o.ID = oi.OPTIONS_ID WHERE p.ID = #{productId} ORDER BY oi.SEQ ASC
SELECT o.*, oi.id as option_items_id, oi.name as option_items_name, oi.price, oi.seq FROM options o LEFT OUTER JOIN option_items oi ON o.id = oi.options_id WHERE o.id = #{id} ORDER BY seq ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO options( ID, NAME, STOCK_CHECK, STOCK, ESSENTIAL, SELECT_MIN, SELECT_MAX ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{stockCheck}, #{stock}, #{essential}, #{selectMin},#{selectMax} )
INSERT INTO option_items( ID, OPTIONS_ID, NAME, PRICE, SEQ ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{optionsId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{seq} )
